innovation_strategy_system.subject: Situation
innovation_strategy_system.front_question: Do you know the struggle you want to help people make progress with?

back_instructions.help_question: What's really bothering people about this situation?
Why would resolving this issue matter to people?
Do you know what's causing this issue to persist?

innovation_strategy_system.subject: Ideas
innovation_strategy_system.front_question: Do you have ideas for innovative ways to help them make progress?

back_instructions.help_question: Have you noticed how people currently attempt to solve this?
Could you think of completely different ways to approach this?

innovation_strategy_system.subject: Focus
innovation_strategy_system.front_question: Do you know the most important aspect of an idea to test?

back_instructions.help_question: What part of your idea is absolutely crucial to validate first?

innovation_strategy_system.subject: Signals
innovation_strategy_system.front_question: Do you know which signals in the world will tell you if an idea works?

back_instructions.help_question: What specific outcomes would indicate your idea is successful?
What concrete data or evidence will show the effectiveness of your idea?

innovation_strategy_system.subject: Probe
innovation_strategy_system.front_question: Do you know how to poke the world to get those signals?

back_instructions.help_question: What's the simplest and quickest way to test your idea?
How fast can you practically validate your critical assumptions?

innovation_strategy_system.subject: Sense
innovation_strategy_system.front_question: Do you know how to interpret the signals to decide what to do next?

back_instructions.help_question: What criteria will you use to decide your next steps based on results?
Do you feel confident in interpreting the results clearly? Why or why not?
